long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TELUS Business Connect Meetings for Chrome OS
 
TELUS Business Connect Meetings expands the power of HD video collaboration to Chrome OS devices. It is an addition to TELUS Business Connect for G Suite integrations. 
 
Meet with participants with HD video and share your screen, important business documents or website with anyone, anywhere and at any time (number of participants depends on Edition type of your Business Connect account).
 
Meetings is free for meeting participants, all they need is a meeting link.
 
Supported features:
 
* HD video and screen sharing
* Dial-In Conference Numbers for Audio: Join the meeting using a telephone dial-in number
* VOIP Audio: Use your computer audio to collaborate
* Host Controls: Hosts can invite participants, mute/unmute meeting attendees, lock the meeting, and remove participants.
* Integrated Chat: Anyone (both hosts and participants) can initiate chat with specific users or the entire group during meetings
